problem_text: \triangle D F G and \triangle F G H are isosceles, m \angle F D H = 28 and D G \cong F G \cong F H. Find the measure of \angle D F G.
compact_text: \triangle DFG and \triangle FGH are isosceles, m \angle FDH = 28 and DG \cong FG \cong FH. Find the measure of \angle DFG.
annotat_text: $\Delta DFG$  and $\Delta F G H$ are isosceles, $m \angle FDH=28$ and$\overline{DG} \cong \overline{FG} \cong \overline{FH}$. Find the measure of $\angle DFG$.
